Topic.Title: Is there a place where all the Quest Libraries are stored?

Posts.EditableText:
If there is a place to get them, I would love to add some libraries to my Quest 3.53. If not, if people wouldn't mind posting some that would be awesome!

Mezmriz

Posts.EditableText: it's not a big or very useful library, but this little one is for feeding Quest with a few useful verbs : http://anamnese.online.fr/if/BasicVerbs.qlb it still needs to be expanded more
Posts.HTML:
it's not a big or very useful library, but this little one is for feeding Quest with a few useful verbs :

Posts.EditableText:
Awesome. I have heard people talk about the new TypeLib from MadBrit and some RPG Library as well. I am wanting to build a little website to host links to every nice library for Quest users. 

Thanks for your post!
